newsitem.title: UK: Venezuela inflation close to 3% by Dec - Petkoff.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela inflation close to 3% by Dec - Petkoff.

text.p: Venezuela's planning minister Teodoro Petkoff said on Tuesday the country was unlikely to meet the International Monetary Fund's target of 1.5 percent for underlying monthly inflation by the end of the year.
"The IMF still believes it can be reached. I myself think that it will be between 2.0 and 3.0 percent by the end of the year," Petkoff told Reuters in an interview in London.
Last May Venezuela's monthly inflation was running at 12.6 percent. In August it came down to 4.2 percent, he said.
Petkoff said that by year-end he expected yearly inflation to be around 90 percent. --Caroline Brothers, London Newsroom +44 171 542 2734
